DOC.brief_title: Endotoxin Challenge Study For Healthy Men Women
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female ( contraception restriction ) , 1850yrs , BMI 1931kg/m2 , Nonsmokers , FEV1 > /= 80 % predict Abnormal troponin and/or CK MB , Participated GSK study involve administration COA > /= 21 day .
